```{r setup, include = FALSE}
# general options --------------------------------------------------------------
options(
  scipen = 999,
  htmltools.preserve.raw = FALSE,
  knitr.kable.NA = " - "
  )
set.seed(42)
# chunk options ----------------------------------------------------------------
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  cache.extra = knitr::rand_seed, 
  message = FALSE, 
  warning = FALSE, 
  error = FALSE, 
  echo = FALSE,
  cache = FALSE,
  comment = "", 
  fig.align = "center", 
  fig.retina = 3
  )
# libraries --------------------------------------------------------------------
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(nomnoml)
```
